action.action-desc: Mr. Palazzo (for himself, Mr. Higgins, Mr. Swalwell of California, Ms. Norton, Mr. Nadler, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Gibson, Mr. Young of Alaska, Mr. Farenthold, Mr. Israel, and Mr. Byrne) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Emergency Information Improvement Act of 2015.

section.header: Eligibility of public broadcasting facilities for certain disaster assistance

subsection.text: Section 102(11)(B) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5122(10)(B)) is amended by inserting public broadcasting facilities, after workshops,.

Section 406(a)(3)(B) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5172(a)(3)(B)) is amended by striking communications, and inserting communications (including broadcast and telecommunications),.

The amendments made by this section shall apply to a major disaster declared by the President under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5121 et seq.) on or after October 28, 2012.
